price: 30. Mpe babangi Allah bakotunama été: Eloko nini Nkolo wa bino akitisi? Bakolobaka: Bolamu, тропа baye babongisaki na bomoi ya nsé na kosala bolamu, kasi efandelo ya mokolo mwa suka nde ezali kitoko koleka, oyo nde ndako ya malamu тропа babangi.
arabic: ۞ وَقِيلَ لِلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ مَاذَآ أَنزَلَ رَبُّكُمۡۚ قَالُواْ خَيۡرٗاۗ لِّلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا حَسَنَةٞۚ وَلَدَارُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ خَيۡرٞۚ وَلَنِعۡمَ دَارُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waqīla lilladhīna ittaqaw mādhā anzala rabbukum qālū khayran lilladhīna aḥsanū fī hādhihi al-dun'yā ḥasanatun waladāru al-ākhirati khayrun walaniʿ'ma dāru al-mutaqīna
